22589562: GET PAID TO STAY - Serendipity Lithgow-Travellers
Kitchen,Wireless Internet,Free parking on premises,Indoor fireplace
June 15 - Aug 31st - one guest will be selected to have the cost of their stay (up to 3 nights maximum) fully refunded PLUS 5%. Will it be you?Got the fire place ready & waiting for you!!'

32761042: Merridy’s house is very neat and lovely. I like everything in her house, especially adorable Peanut!
84335713: Had such a lovely weekend getaway here :).  Fire place roaring, fantastic local recommendations, and star gazing in the backyard in the evening.
85570084: Nice little place in a great location
120601948: From the warm welcome at the door by the exuberant but gentle and well- trained Peanut Poodle, to Merridy's easy going friendliness, this is a great place to stay. Rooms are spacious and clean, well-appointed, and Merridy has made every effort to ensure her guest's comfort, from snuggly warm beds with electric blankets, a heater in each room, to keeping the wood fire in the lounge burning to keep you warm at all times. Generous with her time, and happy to share her knowledge of Lithgow and surrounds, Merridy is the perfect host, and her home in it's peaceful location is the ideal place to be based to explore this lovely area. Thanks Merridy and Peanut for making our trip perfect and satisfying.
2289881:
This is my second time staying at Merridy’s place.
I really love the place, the outstanding hospitality provided by Merridy and the fun of playing with Peanut :D
11797699: Nice place,  very comfortable, walm, great hostess and lovely friendly Peanuts the standard Poodle
122955161: Great host with a very helpful, relaxed, friendly manner.
20343628: We only stayed 1 night but it was exactly what we needed! Comfy bed, with electric blanket to keep us toasty, a lovely dog to play with on arrival and helpful hints from Merridy.
63042658: Meriddy is very accommodating and makes you feel very welcome in her lovely home. The location is excellent, both quiet and handy to the town centre. Merridy is very knowledgeable on the local environment and what to see and do. We had a restful night and will definitely look to book again when back in Lithgow in the future.
11854572: Merridy was a wonderful host, good to make acquaintance with ; helped us a lot in planning our day's activities.
7538271: Merridy was a great hostess. We loved the quiet location. Comfortable bed. Welcoming wood fire. Gorgeous, friendly dog, Peanut.

27794330: Guest accessYouhave the whole house to use and the yards. However the garage is not available for use.'

21554180:
House was comfy, if a little dated. Most importantly, the beds were great to sleep on, perfect after a day of renovation works. 
Thoughtful touches with the bread, condiments and many types of milk! 
Would stay again.
64127091: Plenty of beds and a great heater. A little out of town but a nice walk in if that’s what you enjoy. Plenty of food ie milk provided, which was a lovely touch. Would stay again. Thanks!
37619563: Clean and comfortable, lots of thoughtful touches including a great range of breakfast foods and basics. Good value for money. Communication was friendly, fast and informative.
208997811: Think of this place as ‘Grandma’s house’ with a little bit of a makeover. The house shows its age and is nothing flash. The broken down VW in the carport is also a little off putting. However, the house is very clean and neat. Mick provides very thoughtful touches and the heaters in the bedrooms and living room were very welcome after a cold day spent outside!
22996363: Ashley and Mick were very communicative, instructions were clear and they allowed us to check in late. Their place is very conveniently located just off the highway and a stone's throw away from Lithgow. Small breakfast was provided as well as coffee and tea. We enjoyed our stay here very much.
136971045: Comfortable and easy! A great stay.
227589633: Great value property. Older style house but everything you need, loved the staples left, bread, milk  etc , everything you need without having to rush to the shops.
98680914: Delightful accommodation, thoughtful hosts, great value. Would definitely stay again
245246284: Nice place to stay. Great for a family who wants to explore nearby tourist attractions.
74552350: Basic older style home with all amenities.  Great location for Lithgow.
32533254: The place was absolutely spotless! It was a fantastic stay and they provided extra touches such as breakfast including dietary issues (without even knowing!). Would 100% recommend!
44229192:
Mick's place is fantastic, as we just expected a room each after our days at Bathurst. 
When we arrived we had the whole place to ourselves and the fire place was great when we arrived home each day.
The fridge had goodies that no other place we have been to supplied which was a great help as we didn't really want to shop for odds and ends.
 This home is great to have as a base for holidays as there is so much to see around the area. 
Value for money this place is fantastic.
55781944: We enjoyed our stay. Location is good and easy for us to visit nearby places. Host responded quickly when we had some minor issues. We appreciate the food supply provided. Even though the house is a bit old but it is equipped with all the necessary amenities for comfortable stay. This place is good for group or family.
176339339: This place is large and has all the facilities needed for a short stay, when we got there it was very cold and there was no heating on, the whole place needs a bit of modernisation but everything was functional. Mick was very good at getting back to us and advising on local attractions. The place is not our cup of tea though as it's a bit too basic for us but we are townies....

21133287: Lithgow - Walk to Main St |4+ people |Self CheckIn

Private cosy 2 Bedroom House | Located in a quiet neighbourhood | 5+ Minute walk to Lithgow Main StreetTwo-bedroom home, kitchen / dining, living area with combined bathroom / toilet. Large vacant yard.'

177294696: very cosy and comfy home in a nice quiet area
237998460: Was a great value property with nice homely touches. Will definitely return
57687164:
The place was nice and really clean. The hosts were very welcoming and always quick with responses. If you’re staying during winter, might want to layer up inside as the central
Heating wasn’t sufficient. Other than that, our stay was cozy and peaceful.
257880275: A great place, well located and loved the personal touches. We would recommend this property and certainly will be back if we stay in the Blue Mountains again.
142773713: House was awesome would definitely recommend staying here
179639137: We had a comfortable stay at Sherry's place. The house was clean and the kids loved the chalk board. Fantastic communication too! Thank you and we will be happy to stay again in the future if in the area.
44915223: Clean and cosy house for a small family. It had everything we needed for a weekend away to explore surrounding areas.
4206081: A great house in Lithgow! It was warm and tidy with plenty of room for a family and a lawn out the back with a basketball hoop and lots of space.

1693513: Graces Boutique Accommodation offers premium boutique accommodation in Lithgow.  From the moment you enter our 1920art deco building you will feel right at home.  Our excellently appointed apartment is filled with stylish touches guaranteed to make your stay with us comfortable.  Our 3 bedroom apartment is perfect for couples and business travellers.'

246466843:
Large, stylish, clean,  3 bedroom apartment located in the centre of Lithgow, near the railway station. It is located on the main road and has the railway behind but noise wasn’t really an issue. 
Judy’s place was really comfortable and after arriving from a warmer climate the central heating was a blessing. Comfortable north facing  light filled lounge room with views of the surrounding hills.
The apartment is stylish and the beds are really comfortable. We enjoyed the use of a well catered kitchen and a washing machine. There was also a dryer and airer, iron and board. 
Judy was reliable and easy to communicate with.
43555221: Absolutely loved staying at Graces. Very convenient location, was super clean, with every amenity you could need. Will definitely stay here again if I'm ever in Lithgow in the future!
252426076: Loved our stay, such a lovely homely feel with everything you needed for a few nights away, I was a little worried about the noise with being on the Main Street and a pub across the road but there was no issue at all, would certainly stay again if in the area.
136139961: A lovely, clean, spacious place in a central location with a friendly, efficient host. Perfect for our visit to Lithgow!
93524348: This was the second time I have stayed at Judy's apartment. It is such a lovely place and Judy has thought of every little detail to make your stay comfortable. I highly recommend her apartment.
241948259: Very clean and welcoming.  Beds were very comfortable and the location is perfect.
158450828:
Judy is a wonderful host. The apartment is very stylish and sparkling clean. Very quiet inside and has a beautiful ambiance. Location is excellent. 
I would highly recommend.
82953990: This is a great place to stay in the heart of Lithgow. Our group was three adults and this was a clean, spacious and comfortable space for us, we were really happy with it and would recommend it. Judy was a great host.
47346333: Thanks so much for they stay, Judy!  My mum and brother really loved the space and was in perfect vicinity to the wedding.

20803305: Centre of Lithgow great for family or small groups

76742210: Nice clean little place for a short stay - easy to walk for food and supplies.  Good heater in the lounge for the winter Lithgow nights!
258943855: Really enjoyed my stay cosy and warm well located house in Lithgow. Ticks all the boxes would highly recommend thanks for everything Stephen and Pamela
251642479: This is a really great place to stay, nice n warm close to Main Street. Would recommend for sure
8961809: Clean, warm, comfortable and very close to pubs, clubs, etc.
43335031: Basic but clean facilities. Was warm and spacious. Would stay again. Good value for money.
18436502: would love to stay here again
3275072:
The communication was good and the place was as described. It got cooler at night but we were fine inside and it was nice. The location is very convenient. Close to park, shops and the train station.

If you are tall(more than 1m75) you may find the beds too short. 
The host recommended us places to go and it was very nice. We enjoyed the area and would consider coming back. Thanks

109080056: Fantastic setting and the beer tasting was a real treat. Would certainly come again.

16780653: A beautiful little self contained, spacious, tastefully renovated three room suite. part of a large house, yet completely separate and private, with own private front and rear entrances. 208629105: We had a wedding at Seclusions Spa so this was an ideal location for our overnight stay. The apartment was spotlessly clean, very cosy and most importantly had an electric blanket which was hugely appreciated. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend.
57832961:
Mike's place was so nice and cosy! We enjoyed all of his little touches such as leaving the heater on for us upon arrival and also placing snacks around the Airbnb. The place was just what we needed for a weekend away.
Thank you for your hospitality Mike!
110907178: Very cute space, cosy without being cramped. Stayed nice and toasty with the heaters and electric blankets. No fuss getting in or out. Really enjoyed the extra touches of tea, milk and a fruit bowl. Thanks Mike!
225354905: Booked it for a weekend getaway for my parents. Was easy for them to find and they had no complaints whatsoever. Very pleased with the experience.
259913170: Nice place to stay. Well located, quiet and beautifully clean.
1868093: Very cosy place with complete amenities. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
16487527:
A quiet self contained 3 room unit , a short drive to Lithgow town and other attractions. We had wonderful weather for exploring. I did notice plenty of books and  DVDs available for those stay inside days.  The beds were comfy. Mike was considerate and the rooms were warm with the heaters on ready for our arrival. We were pleased to find a bowl of fruit, milk and bottled water.
The rooms were spacious, clean  and quiet. There was ample parking at the door for our separate entry. Magpie Hideaway more than met our expectations for our weekend stay.
249820858: All I have to say is simply amazing experience staying at Magpie Hideaway. Starting with excellent communication with Mike where he responded all queries, and when we reached he warmly greeted us to his beautiful apartment. The apartment was very clean, comfortable, and nicely decorated. Mike has carefully organised each items we need on daily basis in a house. He has a TV room with collection of books and CDs including readily available information of what to do, see and eat in the area. Everything about the experience is first class. We really would like to stay longer. Mike is simply super host, very thoughtful and friendly. Thank you- we really enjoyed our stay!
10369661: We had a fantastic stay at Magpie Hideaway and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for accommodation in the Lithgow/South Bowenfels area. Mike was a fantastic host and the accommodation was lovely inside. Well appointed, spacious, comfortable and very clean. The fruit bowl and biscuits are a lovely touch.  We went to the Japanese bathhouse which is just a 5 minute drive away and it was great to just float out of there and only have a 5 minute drive. We can't wait to stay again.
107026960: First time using airbnb, thought this great accommodation, spacious, clean, peaceful and relaxing, ample parking, Mike was a lovely host who was very helpful and thoughtful - heaters were warming space (cold and rainy weekend), enjoyed the fruit and other goodies, would definitely recommend and return, cannot fault anything ... local knowledge and suggestions were welcomed ... THANK YOU!
23166298: I sent my folks to Mike as a gift. They loved their time away and said the accomodation was just perfect! Highly recommend!
11803538: We had a great time at Mike's place. The house is very nice, clean and inviting (and the Scrabble is a nice touch :) ). Thank you!
241641961: Great place to stay. Well secluded and Mike was an excellent host who will respect your privacy if desired.
52739321: This was a great place for us to stay while at the Blue Mountains on the weekend. It was a perfect location for us, and the place was very clean and well-equipped. We really appreciated the fruit and water bottles for us in the fridge. We will definitely be staying here again for future trips!
8246585: The perfect Airbnb - clean, quiet with thoughtful additions throughout - highly recommend this place :)
1879668:
A charming stay at Mikes place.
Perfectly located by the Japanese Baths, Glow Worm tunnel  and Hassan’s Walls Lookout. 
The place was private, very comfortable with friendly touches- fresh fruit, lots of tourist info, cosy comfortable bed and impeccably clean.

16229532: The accommodation provides 3 beds in two rooms. guests will be sharing a family room with the use of a television.  on sunny days access to a patio and the garden are also available. The church is close to parks, shops and a newly build indoor and outdoor swimming pool.'

262076126: Ericas home was quaint but didn't realise that is is a share accommodation. In saying that it was great to have early access to the property 830am, as we were travelling and needed somewhere early. Bed were warm and comfortable.
59557357: Erica's house is lovely - great atmosphere and Erica was very friendly and helpful.

Excellent accommodation in Lithgow

106769142: This is a wonderful place with an amazing host! If you're looking for a home away from home, this is it! 5+ stars
87838550: Erica was very hospitable and we would certainly visit again.

31502250: The main house is set on a quiet street and the Den faces onto a (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a private dwelling with courtyard equipped with bbq and outdoor setting.Kangaroos can often be seen in the reserve,especially after rain,blue tongue lizards in abundance in the summer and plenty of birdlife.'

234678051: Great space close to center of town, much bigger than expected.
262181517: The place was fantastic  close to town and everything that I needed for my trip. I would highly recommend this place for anyone wanting to stay in Lithgow.
32951594: Excellent nights accommodation at Christine's place. Perfect pit stop on our way through to the mountains. Had everything we need, comfy beds, plenty of bedding and nice and warm. Would stay here again
46997633:
We relaxed during the crisp, cold days at Lithgow Den with the added excitement of kangaroos over the fence. The facilities were spacious, clean and well equipped with fun indoor tasks for those indoor moments. 
Excellent location to the town centre but with the added bonus of open spaces and wild kangaroos entertaining our youngster each morning.
4293411:
Christine’s place is spacious, clean and comfortable!! (And also very warm and cosy on those cold winter nights!)

It is equipped with all the amenities you would need to have a pleasant stay!
96741519: The guesthouse was comfortable and cosy accommodation - would be happy to stay again!
115274865: A very nice place just of town and very quiet. I would stay again
132729953: Christine’s lithgow den was probably one of the best Airbnb’s I have stayed at. The hosts were very welcoming and friendly. The gas heating and thick linen sheets made my stay very comfortable. I would definitely stay here again in the future. Thanks!

24343798: Cute little semi, comfy and clean, electric blankets on all beds, gas heating in living areas, electric in bedrooms. 200mtrs to Lithgowmajor shopping complex, Coles, Target and numerous smaller stores. 35456134: Perfect - cosy, comfortable and clean.  We really appreciated the warm house and chocolates when we arrived.  Thank you.
12772330: A very comfortable, clean and stylish cottage in Lithgow. Lots of thoughtful touches including having the heaters on to warm the house before we arrived.
122960782: Generous host, lovely little house with all the comforts for a pleasant stay in Lithgow.
185827273: Very tidy and cozy. Convenient location. Would recommend and stay again. Thanks Adam!
262336345: Excellent host and felt like I had the privacy of a hotel room with many little surprises that made it so much better

99044015: We had a great night at Adam’s house which was clean, cozy and so close to the supermarket.

259712777: Clean, tidy and a very convenient location. Thanks
23100827: Stayed for the weekend and it was a lovely stay! The house was very very warm and Adam made sure heating was on when we arrived. Thank you!

32971642: Ideally located 2 minute walk from Secret Creek Sanctuary and Secret Creek Cafe and Restaurant. 20 minute walk to main Street and train station. 24344150: This two bedroom semi has a great atmosphere. Lots of natural light. Gas and electric heating in large living room. Electric heating in bedrooms and electric blankets on both beds. 230120001: Adam is a wonderful and thoughtful host. We were provided with many amenities and even left the heater on for when we arrived. The house was very clean, cozy and is walking distance to town. It's a great place to rest after visiting the Japanese Bath House.
66275027: What an awesome place to stay. Everything we needed and more.  Close to everything and a very kind and attentive host.  We loved our stay here.
29085785:
Beautiful place with nice touches. It feels like going back in time! There is heating in every bedroom, living room which kept us warm over the chilly weekend. And those electric “fire” ovens were so cute  and efficient. It was a nicer to stay in the house rather than in a Motel...
Adam is a great host and responds super quick to any inquiry.
12351176: Clean and warm place for a weekend stay
34255679: Highly recommend staying here! Lovely place and host
107733112:
What an awesome little place! 
Perfect little getaway for the family.
When we visited, the temperature was zero degrees overnight, but the little fireplaces kept the whole house nice and cosy!
Thank you again, we will definitely be back one day!
75807842: Great place to stay - warm and very comfortable. Very close to all amenities.
60693264: What a great place to stay! Very clean, lovely comfy bed and some really thoughtful extras.
211805949: Adam is a super host.  Very friendly and super helpful.
94140355: Book this place! Adam is a great host, and the place is brilliant. Very clean, comfortable, and so much more spacious than it looks in the photos. It has an old world charm, but with the modern conveniences. Location is convenient to the gardens at Mt Wilson, and the other usual attractions at the Blue Mountains; and Adam is super helpful with other recommendations should you need. Book this place, you won't regret it.
216831193: A very nice and clean house with local amenities close by.

25307039: ALL DOONAS ARE DUCK DOWN DOONASA light filled cute and peaceful 2 bedroom cottage. Perched on a hillside with georgous views over Lithgow and the surrounding mountains. Wifi, Foxtel and Netflix included.  Only 5 minutes drive to the town centre, close to Jenolan Caves, Bathurst is 45 minute drive and Katoomba is close by. Some guests say they love my house so much they donwant to leave :) Iincluded things like fruit, milk, porridge, eggs when my chickens are laying and home made jam.'

165886559: We were kindly welcomed by Radha and she was able to recommend great places to eat and look at. Lovely little Airbnb home
50170272:
Nestled in the cradle of Lithgow, you can feel the the crisp air, clean and refreshing. Radha was a kind host, and her place is warm and cosy. We loved all the decorations. The beds were comfrtable and the place was warm. She provided hot water bottles, but with the central heating we didn't need them. She kept some chickens which were well looked after and didn't make any noised in the morning. The joey she was taking care of was such a dear. My Little one loved petting it and smiled so much. 
The cooking utensils were good and there was various coffees and teas as well as breakfast cereal. The shower had good temperature with soaps and body wash. 
A lovely stay thank you Radha
8978572: Radha is a great host. Very considerate. Highlight was being able to see the baby kangaroo she rescued.
47238193: Roo Cottage is exactly as described - a cosy and comfortable home away from home. We were made to feel so welcome the moment we arrived as Radha greeted us and showed us around her place. It had everything we needed for our little weekend getaway - fully stocked kitchen, access to Netflix/Foxtel to keep us entertained and a great AC/extra water bottles and blankets to keep us warm. We were also lucky enough to meet the joey and the chooks. Can't recommend this place enough. Thank you Radha!
9511939: rhada was very accommodating and flexible with my group. my three year old cousins absolutely adored getting to hang out with the baby wombats and kangaroos as did I!
260489195: please do not hesitate to select this place as the host is one of the best I have ever met.
35470543: Radha was the perfect host. If your looking to stay in Lithgow, we could not recommend Radha and her beautiful cottage more. Clean, cosy, and everything you could need and more (the cute Joey was a huge bonus). We will definitely book with Radha again if we are ever in town.
230239532: If you need a place to stay that is welcoming, warm and cosy this is it this was our first ever Air BnB stay so we’re unsure what to expect. We attended Ironfest a local event and Rada was very knowledgeable about this event we were able to relax cook our own meals shower was nice and hot, there was heating but we didn’t need it at all.
29940019: Excellent hosts, Radha and the two cutes littles kangaroos, very keen to help with any issue. We enjoyed very fresh eggs for breakfast. Good location and very comfortable place.
7496749: Radha's place was amazing, a true airbnb where we stayed in her lovely home, she was quick to respond with local recommendations and got to meet the fostered baby Kangaroos!!!  It was truly amazing and would stay there again for sure, great value/price and lovely stay.
186857466:
Radha was a great host - very responsive, kind and helpful with some great local recommendations for our stay in Lithgow. The place was great for our quick stopover in Lithgow. The baby joeys were very cute and made our stay there that little more special and unique :).
Thanks again Radha!
50090380: Very "homely" house. Close to major shops. Radha is an excellent communicator.
253932515: Good location, baby kangaroos were amazing, kind host with good recommendations.

22800661: Great place for families. Room for 6 in three bedrooms with large lounge room, separate dining room, kitchen.'

113912538: The unit was bigger than expected and well equipped. Had everything we needed, great location. All the heaters kept us warm.
245737637: Place is in good location. Neat and tidy and everything we wanted. Easy walk to shops.building can be a bit noisy abd didnt realise the train line is right at vack door. Beds very comfortable
202673874: Great house and location. Thanks for you great hospitality!
85421316: It is a nice and convenient location if you are travelling around Blue Mountain or Jenolan caves area and we had great stay at Trevor's place
211630749: Great Location- awesome playground across the road. Host very friendly & accommodating. Apartment was much larger than we were expecting. Neat & tidy. Everything you need. Hot water does run out quickly, only need to wait @ 15min for more. TV reception not all that good. Would definately stay again
11247336:
Trevor's place was lovely and clean, however we had significant time issues checking-in. He was unresponsive to all of our calls/texts and messages and had to wait 3 hours before he called me back. We almost cancelled and booked another place.

The hot water also doesnt last more than 5 minutes, so isn't ideal for groups.
169658413: Really stylish, clean, spacious room. Trevor is nice host. There are gas heater & electrocal heater for house warming in winter. Good location close to coles, wooly, & restaurants
4267282:
Trevor was friendly and met us there (even though we were running late) and he was very considerate by coming to the apartment when the the main building fire alarm was going off - he was very apologetic even though it wasn’t his fault. His place was nice with all basic amenities. Sheets were crisp and clean. He also provided coffee, tea, sugar and small milk boxes in fridge.

Trevor’s place is great to stay if visiting the Blue Mountains and Jenolan Caves.
152413724: Trevor’s place is a great bargain especially travelling with a family group, it was spacious, clean, thought out in detail for practicalities and comfort. Trevor is hospitable and friendly, we were sorry not to have had time to take up his invitation to visit his animal Sanctuary where there is also a vegan restaurant. Will do so next time, thanks Trevor.
7490104: Is quite calm place, near to all amenitites and in good condition
185254086: Great hospitality, perfect location for our purposes. Clean - all round great property and owner
181342670: Nice place to stay for a short break. Trevor was very friendly and cooperative. Great location near local restaurants and the park. It is an older building with a few interesting quirks, eg the floor boards creak loudly (particularly at night!) and the hot water doesn’t last long. Overall, we would come again.
181861437: Spacious, clean and in a good location at the end of the main shopping strip. An interesting art deco building that has been very well renovated. A huge plus was the clean, quality linen and bedding (these are really hotel-quality beds and linen) - really important at the end of a long day exploring the Blue Mountains. The kitchen was well stocked on our arrival with tea, coffee, milk in the fridge. Check-in was so easy with Trevor's sister meeting us at the apartment and showing us around. Would stay here again without a doubt! Highly recommended :)
167871011: Very friendly, clean and comfy. Everything we asked was no hassle at all. Pretty private. Felt really at ease.
78527967: Stayed here for a local wedding. Space was good, photos were accurate. Short walk to the local restaurants. The space is located in front of a train line, which was noisy when trains passed through.
177039360: Good apartment with lots of space.  Very handy to town, only minutes to restaurants and shops.  Good parking.  Ideal for two couples, third room a bit more cramped.  Tidy, clean and very comfortable.
122419910: Friendly host. House has a lovely outdoor area and is a great location close to Afan Forest Park and mountain biking
115706852: Trevor’s place is spacious, clean and the kitchen made me feel like I was at home. The location is great and within walking distance from many great restaurants in Lithgow.

15381423: Our home is located a convenient 5 minute drive from town. We have a lovely picturesque 360 degree view of the mountains and are surrounded by a beautiful natural bush land setting with lots of wildlife. We offer free wifi and breakfast with tea / coffee. Check in time is from 8pm'

154641433: Perfect place of you want a quiet place to sleep before continuing with your travels.
240063174: Really lovely hosts and a good place to crash while you're exploring the local area. Very clean and thoughtful, room was very clean.
28482063: Clean as described room... great wi fi.
117700844: Super friendly, nice, cosy stay with thoughtful touches.
41688526: Great stay again, communication was always prompt and helpful, room was as described and breakfast was more than enough. Would recommend!
22171269: Clean nice and quite room, lovely hosts. Would and probably will stay there again.
13678301: So impressed with this place. From speedy replies to flexible and clean - all the details were very thoughtful: the bed was warmed before I arrived, fresh towel and slippers provided, breakfast... the bathroom was clean. Thanks very much!!
148349771: Thank you for your quick responses and hospitality! Until next time!! Highly recommend!!
125618613: Booked this room for one of our staff who was working in the area.  He said it was great.
12815011: As described, a great cosy and quite room to get some decent shut eye.
105419076: Great spot. Nice hosts. Warm cosy house

21205929: Our home is in a pleasant bushy setting on a hill with a lovely view over the historic town of Lithgow. It is close to all services, shops and transport. Centrally located to other major popular sites in the area such as Katoomba - only 30minutes away in one direction and Bathurst another 35 mins in another. Nearby are also: The Jenolan Caves, Lake Lyell, Lake Wallace, Mt Piper Power Station and lots of other places to explore and enjoy during a visit to the area.'

255658921: Wonderful house, perfect location close to town, so clean, and just what we needed. Highly recommend for all!
175179708: Large cosy house with great amenities, great host, will stay again
6793692: Mark & Clara’s place was fantastic! We were getting married at the Lithgow State Mine nearby & needed somewhere close and comfortable that would also accommodate the bridal party as they got ready. The space was large and the views were spectacular. The bathrooms and heating were particularly fantastic. Mark and Clara were easy & a delight to deal with. I would definitely stay there again!
50936703: Clean and comfortable home in a stunning location! A great place for a weekend away just outside Sydney.
42174480: Lovely, clean and flexible. Very friendly and helpful hosts. Looking for a little escape, this is the place to go!
230851065: Lovely home with gorgeous views & everything you need. We’d stay there again!!

12208971: Hidden away behind the picket fence are the park-like gardens of Bristol, a beautiful, cosy 1908 English style minercottage beaming with storybook charm...'

45888802: Very warm, cosy house. Walking distance to the Blue Fox (great spot for dinner). The heating was excellent. Super comfortable beds. Good size kitchen for cooking. Enjoyed Sharon's snacks she left for us.
70053580: We had a sisters getaway here and very much enjoyed the peaceful and quiet location. The couch, TV and heater in the lounge were amazing -we pretty much stayed in there for most of it!
43668308: Sharon’s place is by far the best airbnb I’ve stayed at, it’s clean, warm, well equipped with everything and overall a perfect home experience. It’s spacious and was great for the small dinner I hosted.
55205617: Super host doesn’t seem enough to describe the hospitality of Sharon at Bristol. From our first communication, Sharon made us feel confident in our choice and boy did she deliver! Due to a unique circumstance of trying to celebrate our new marriage whilst mourning a tragic death in our family the same week, Sharon provided us with a beautiful tranquil space to nurture all of our emotions. Local knowledge and recommendations were spot on, home cosy and warm as described, ambiance perfect. Generous touches by a marvellous host who made us feel incredibly special. Heartfelt thank you. Highly recommended. Sharon puts the glow in Lith-glow!!
87271328:
Sharon was a splendid host whose thoughtful touches around the home made our stay so much more special! We’d definitely recommend this beautiful  and warm treasure tucked away in Lithgow which is a short drive away from local attractions such as the Jenolan Caves, Three Sisters, Echo Point etc.

Thank you so much Sharon!

10518879: Lovely 2 bedroom semi detached cottage. If you are looking for a quiet get away from the hustle and bustle then this is for you. Large garden and deck area for you to unwind.In winter we keep the central heating at 22 degrees for energy efficiency but for those that like it warmer there are plenty of spare blankets.'

23021351: Great little place situated fairly conveniently for the Blue Mountains. Juanita is an excellent and pro-active host.
11249866: Lovey character filled cottage which was very warm and cozy. Hosts were friendly and welcoming. Thanks for a great stay!
98680914: The house and gardens are lovely.  The beds are really comfy and the Host is great. The shower in the bath may prove difficult for some.
232436187: Clean premises, Lovely back yard & deck to enjoy the outside.
131911431:
Charming place with a lovely garden, conveniently located just outside Lithgow. Good base for a night or two. 
Clean and comfy. Some highway noise from front bedroom at night but nothing too bad. Host very flexible and accommodating. Would recommend.
6641991: A lovely house, and welcoming host, and easy to find as it’s located on the main road.
846127:
We had a great time staying at Jaunita's place and exploring the surrounding area for a few days. The space was pretty cosy and quirky, and fun for our two little ones to explore. The garden and deck were particularly nice, and Juanita's mom who lives next door was such a pleasure to meet! 

It is worth noting that the house empties on a major highway and it was very challenging  backing the car out of the narrow driveway into traffic each time we left. Also, the amenities provided were a bit patchy, so if you have anything you definitely can't go without (especially in the kitchen) you would be wise to bring it along.
42180843: Thank you for a lovely stay. It was in a perfect location for us as we spent the afternoon at the Japanese Bath house out near lake lyell, very convenient. Thanks Again.
53520762: A charming residence with great style and impeccably clean. Friendly hosts with great tips on local attractions.
247746046: Had a great stay at the wonderful artists retreat. Very cosy and cool house. Garden was amazing. Great location close to town (but not in it!)
217671063: thank you, it was a pleasure
7829307:
We had a lovely stay in this beautiful character filled home in a great location to explore the Blue Mountains. The garden and outdoor space is lovely and the homemade treats were delicious. 
Juanita was very quick replying to messages. We would highly recommend this property to friends.
189249425: We had a great time staying at this place and Adele was a very great host too (she’s Juanita’s mum). She recommended nice places to visit and was very friendly. The place was clean though it’s a renovated old unit. U can find almost all kinds of amenities to cook. Things to note: there’s no wifi and the place is exactly on the great western highway so sometimes it’s a bit hard to enter or exit due to many cars passing by. It can also be a little noisy
30501135: We stayed two nights with my mum and 5 years old son to attend the wedding in Rydal. Clean, spacious great location. Having breakfast in sunny beautiful garden was a treat. Juanita's mum who lives next door was lovely and helpful, added a special touch to the place. It will be perfect if there is a WIFI but not a major issue. highly reccomended. Thank you for having us!
